name: UIPercentDrivenInteractiveTransition
desc: An object that drives an interactive animation between one view controller and another.

items.name: var timingCurve: UITimingCurveProvider?
items.desc: The timing curve to use when driving the animations.

items.name: var completionCurve: UIView.AnimationCurve
items.desc: Indicates the animation completion curve for an interactive transition.

items.name: var duration: CGFloat
items.desc: The overall duration (in seconds) of the transition animation.

items.name: var percentComplete: CGFloat
items.desc: The amount of the transition (specified as a percentage of the overall duration) that is complete.

items.name: var completionSpeed: CGFloat
items.desc: The speed of the transition animation.

items.name: var wantsInteractiveStart: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the animations are interactive initially.

items.name: func update(CGFloat)
items.desc: Updates the completion percentage of the transition.

items.name: func cancel()
items.desc: Notifies the system that user interactions canceled the transition.

items.name: func finish()
items.desc: Notifies the system that user interactions signaled the completion of the transition.
